company.entity_resolution_notes: Entity resolved as the Norwegian legal company ADDCON NORDIC AS (org nr 988 774 677) on Proff; Norske utslipp also lists Addcon Nordic in Porsgrunn under the same chemical industry category [1][2].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Reviewed Norwegian company/permit sources describe production based on formates/formic acid and handling of formic acid/potassium hydroxide, but do not document recycled/recovered/waste-derived inbound inputs (SRM) [1][3][4].
gaps_and_uncertainties: No sustainability/annual report with quantified inbound recycled material mix was identified in the reviewed Norwegian sources [1][2].
Available permit-control documentation focuses on compliance, emissions, and chemical handling; it does not provide evidence of SRM feedstocks as inbound inputs [3].
